casebody.data:
Douglas PARISI, Appellant/Cross-appellee,
v.
UNIFIED GOVERNMENT OF WYANDOTTE COUNTY, Kansas, Kansas City, Kansas Police Department, Rodney Smith, Terry Ziegler, Kevin Steele, Michael Vivian, Pamela Waldeck, and Kelly Herron, Appellees/Cross-appellants. No. 118,284 Court of Appeals of Kansas. Opinion filed November 2, 2018.

Affirmed in part. Reversed in part. Remanded.
